title: Sketchbook, "Sketchbook with Design Concepts for Product Packaging, Furniture, and Kitchenware", 1998
title_raw: Sketchbook with Design Concepts for Product Packaging, Furniture, and Kitchenware
medium: Black cardboard cover with 42 leaves and rollerball pen in black and red  ink
inscribed: Inscriptions throughout.  Only two dated pages; p. 15 and p. 19; both dated:  3.23.98.
description: Bound with black cover; 42 leaves; 3 sheets are partially cut free of binding; vestige of other pages previously removed.  This sketchook contains concept sketches pertaining to beauty products for Issey Miyake (pp. 1/7,8,15/33); thermos flask for Guzzini (p. 35verso); cutlery tray (pp. 10/11); tables and chairs (pp. 7verso, 9, 12/14, 37/38); Cappellini (p. 37); candle lamp (p. 34).  [See separate cataloguing for key pages.

tombstone.epitaph: Sketchbook, "Sketchbook with Design Concepts for Product Packaging, Furniture, and Kitchenware", 1998. Black cardboard cover with 42 leaves and rollerball pen in black and red  ink. Gift of Karim Rashid. 2000-50-32-1/42.
